definition: acrobatic display (esp. on horseback) (old)/variant of 懈[xie4] and 邂[xie4] (old)
to divide/to break up/to split/to separate/to dissolve/to solve/to melt/to remove/to untie/to loosen/to open/to emancipate/to explain/to understand/to know/a solution/a dissection

sentences.english: The solubility of the resin depends on the critical balance of positively and negatively charged ions.
sentences.chinese: 树脂的溶解性取决于阴，阳离子的电平衡。

sentences.english: The method is applied to determination of total and soluble fluoride in tooth pastes.
sentences.chinese: 该方法用于测定牙膏中总的溶解性氟化物。

sentences.english: The long chain of alkyl increased the solubility of perylene diimides.
sentences.chinese: 长链烷基明显改善了苝酰亚胺的溶解性。

sentences.english: The solubility and emulsification capability of hydrolyzed collagen were significantly improved.
sentences.chinese: 酶解后胶原蛋白的溶解性及乳化性均显著提高。

sentences.english: The solubility of a typical protein is at its minimum at its isoelectric point .
sentences.chinese: 一般来说，蛋白质的溶解性在它等电点时是最低的。

sentences.english: These results suggested that HHV6 infection could activate KSHV lytic cycle replication.
sentences.chinese: HHV6感染可激活KSHV的溶解性周期复制。

sentences.english: Hard water has a high mineral content. Most of the dissolved minerals are either calcium or magnesium.
sentences.chinese: 水之矿物质含量较高，其溶解性金属以钙及镁为主。
